title: Siberia: the endless horizon
brief_description: Deals with the nomadic people of Northern Siberia and explains their dependence on the reindeer. Traces the history of these people and the steps that have been taken to integrate them into Russian life. Edited from the documentary “Siberia: the endless horizon”. Part 3: survival in a cold climate.
